node.title: A 2020 Rewind & Grid 2.4 News!
node.excerpt: Grid 2.4 is now live on testnet and we've got some 2020 highlights to share with you as well!

node.title: Update on the 1st Grid Enhancement Proposal
node.excerpt: With 97% positive votes, we are moving forward with the first Grid Enhancement Proposal. Here's what it means.

node.title: What's Possible on Grid 2
node.excerpt: While we work to open testing of Grid 3.0, we wanted to outline what's already available to test on Grid 2.

node.title: Grid 2.7 is Live on Testnet

node.title: Introducing TF Chain and Updated Billing

node.title: Presenting the new Explorer UI for Grid 3.x
node.excerpt: The updated Explorer brings a simple interface and true decentralization to the way compute, storage, and network capacity information is sourced from 3Nodes.

node.title: All About ThreeFold Grid 3
node.excerpt: As the team is working hard on bringing ThreeFold Grid 3 to mainnet, we wanted to remind you of what's new and what's coming!

node.title: Bridges Connecting the ThreeFold Ecosystem to External Networks
node.excerpt: Since the launch of ThreeFold Grid 3.0, TFT is now available on three blockchains â€“ Stellar, Binance Smart Chain and the Substrate-based ThreeFold Blockchain (aka TF Chain).

node.title: Solving the Blockchain Dilemma
node.excerpt: Blockchain technology has the power to change the world of IT. There are a huge number of new initiatives using blockchain technology around the world, with countless use cases.

node.title: What Bitcoin did to money, ThreeFold is doing to the Internet
node.excerpt: As the Internet is struggling with issues due to its centralized model, ThreeFold spent the last six years developing a new open-source peer-to-peer Internet infrastructure from the ground up.

node.title: Connecting the Dots: ThreeFold plans to scale globally
node.excerpt: ThreeFold started as an idea about ten years ago and is now manifesting itself into the most comprehensive peer-to-peer Internet and cloud infrastructure in the world. The potential of our technology to revolutionize digitization globally is endless and limited only to our collective imagination.

node.title: How ThreeFold Can Truly Decentralize Blockchain
node.excerpt: Is a blockchain truly decentralized if it is being hosted on a centralized solution? We say, no.

node.title: Building the Future We Want to Live In â€“ A Four Step Journey
node.excerpt: Driven by our planet-first, people-first philosophy, the ThreeFold movement is shaping the world we want to live in and laying the foundation for an open, inclusive and abundance-based future.

node.title: The Internet is Moving to the Edge
node.excerpt: With emerging technologies like IoT, Web 3 and more, computing needs to be pushed from centralized data centers to the edge of the network. Learn why ThreeFold is the ideal foundation for a thriving interconnected future.

node.title: The Internet that connects us also manipulates us. In search of a better future.
node.excerpt: The Internet as we know it was once free and decentralized by nature. Over time, the Internet lost its neutrality. ThreeFold represents an opportunity to realize the initial promise of a distributed and neutral Internet owned by the people.

node.title: Internet is growing wild
node.excerpt: The internet is growing at an extremely fast pace, but is that a good thing?

node.title: Interview â€“ Designing Solutions for a P2P Future
node.excerpt: An interview with Jonas Delrue from Jimber, the team developing P2P solutions like video chat and office workspace, using the Digital Twin platform. Digital Twin is a use case on top of the ThreeFold Grid.

node.title: How to stop the Internet from Gobbling the Worldâ€™s Energy
node.excerpt: Oftentimes, the Internetâ€™s significant energy consumption and climate impacts go unnoticed. At ThreeFold, we're leading the way by working on energy-efficient and sustainable solutions for the Internet.

node.title: Peer-to-Peer Overcomes Web3 Challenges
node.excerpt: The promise of Web3 is tremendous, but there are clear limitations to overcome. How? Peer-to-peer systems and blockchains, side by side. The best of both worlds.

node.title: Planting the Seeds: ThreeFold's Plans to Regenerate the Planet
node.excerpt: We believe our planet needs regenerative solutions at a large scale. ThreeFold and Take Action Global (TAG) are on a mission to regenerate the planet together.

node.title: A Journey through the Decentralization and Blockchain Space â€“ Part Two: Akash
node.excerpt: This post is the second one in a series to explore fellow projects and their solutions with regards to what they share with ThreeFold but also where we differ. Follow me on my journey through the space. This time, we're looking into Akash!

node.title: A Journey through the Decentralization and Blockchain Space â€“ Part One: Dfinity
node.excerpt: This post is the first one in a series to explore fellow projects and their solutions with regards to what they share with ThreeFold but also where we differ. Follow me on my journey through the space. First up â€“ Dfinity!

node.title: A Journey through the Decentralization and Blockchain Space â€“ Part Three: Filecoin
node.excerpt: This post is the third one in a series to look into fellow projects and their solutions to better understand the space we operate in and how ThreeFold stands out. This time, we're taking a closer look at Filecoin!

node.title: Co-Realizing the Promise
node.excerpt: Together with our global community, we're realizing the initial promise of an open-source, peer-to-peer Internet owned by the people.

node.title: Our Quest to Fully Decentralize the Internet
node.excerpt: It's our mission to transform the Internet and Cloud. Learn more about the status quo and how we're working on fully decentralizing the entire Internet!

node.title: Stake TFT and Become a ThreeFold Validator
node.excerpt: ThreeFold is realizing the initial promise of an open-source, peer-to-peer Internet owned by the people. Anyone can become a validator and participate in the decentralization of the Internet economy.

node.title: A new approach to the Internet Architecture
node.excerpt: The Edge internet needs a different approach. So, we started as from scratch and shaped a totally new approach..

node.title: Introducing the TF (Chain) Admin Portal â€“ for farmers and grid users!
node.excerpt: Last week, we shared an update on what's new in TF Grid 3.0.1 â€“ and the path to mainnet! There's been a lot of exciting progress by the team, and we wanted to share more details with you, starting with the admin portal!

node.title: A Smart Contract for all IT workloads
node.excerpt: The Smart Contract for IT allows you, your company or your community to execute the storage and running of your files and applications securely with consensus and automatic billing.

node.excerpt: The third release of the ThreeFold Grid represents a major step in the decentralization of the Peopleâ€™s Internet with the Smart Contract for IT coming to life on the ThreeFold Blockchain (aka â€œTF Chainâ€).

node.title: The ThreeFold Grid 3.x Explorer UI
node.excerpt: The Explorer was designed to provide a simple way for anyone to find decentralized Internet capacity on the ThreeFold Grid, and weâ€™re thrilled to announce a new user interface for Grid 3.x on both testnet and devnet!

node.title: The ThreeFold Grid is by the People, For the People
node.excerpt: ThreeFold's open source technology powers the peer-to-peer Internet revolution that holds the premise to disrupt the global Internet in many ways.

node.title: Why is ThreeFold P2P Cloud the better solution for customers than Amazon Web Services or Microsoft Azure?
node.excerpt: As weâ€™ve recently been exploring decentralized projects to see where ThreeFold is in the space and where we stand out, we thought itâ€™s a good time to also look into how we compare to traditional, centralized cloud providers.

node.title: ThreeFold at Consensus: A Decentralized World is in Our Hands
node.excerpt: Itâ€™s that time of the year when believers and builders of a decentralized tomorrow gather to celebrate the festival for the decentralized world. And ThreeFold is the foundation to realize a truly decentralized world.

node.title: Why Anyone Should Consider Becoming A (ThreeFold) Farmer
node.excerpt: The ThreeFold Foundation is changing the way how "we" as a whole approach the internet and its underlying technology..
